titles.title: Earnings Test Elimination
Older Americans' Equity Act of 1993
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Older Americans' Equity Act of 1993 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.
